name: Hickory
long_description:
We're a fast-growing Y-Combinator (S15) backed startup, based in New York.

Hickory is the only training tool focused on retention, turning Sales and Customer Service staff into brand experts. The app predicts when a rep will forget what theyâ€™ve learned, and schedules review exercises tailored to their strengths and weaknesses to prevent that from happening.
one_liner: Hickory turns your employees into experts.
